longMSG:
You are in the garden. 
 There are a shed and a bench.
 You may go...
    south to the kitchen through the backdoor, or
    southwest to the courtyard through the garden gate.
shortMSG:
You are in the garden. 
 Features: shed, bench.
 Areas you may go to:
    south - backdoor to kitchen - 1st floor
    southwest - garden gate to courtyard
